text:
[Verse]
Neon signs glow bright
In the city night
People start to dance
Lost in this trance

[Verse 2]
Car horns in the air
Electric everywhere
Feet move to the beat
Life on every street

[Chorus]
City lights shine bright
Make the world feel right
In this urban maze
Lost in city's blaze

[Verse 3]
Skyscrapers touch the sky
Moonlight passing by
Every corner new
With a different view

[Verse 4]
Laughter in the parks
Shadows after dark
Music in the breeze
Feel the city's tease

[Chorus]
City lights shine bright
Make the world feel right
In this urban maze
Lost in city's blaze
title: City Lights
